title: Amazing! 10/10
review: OK, I don't usually leave reviews but I felt I had to with IT! This movie was (in my opinion) AMAZING!! This was everything I hoped it would be. I've seen WAY too many Stephen King book-to-movie adaptations and let's be honest, most of them are pretty poor! And it's not every often that a remake of a move is better than the original. But seriously, with this movie BOTH scenarios are true! This movie was absolutely superb! Great acting and great direction! Can't wait for Chapter 2!!
